state.title: ISBN Generating
state.description: Some ISBN need to be generated

state.title: ISBN Checking
state.description: All isbns are validated. A system performs it.

state.title: ISBN Correcting
state.description: There are some wrong ISBN. It is necessary to correct is.

transition.title: One File Antivirus Has not Passed
transition.action: One File Antivirus Has not Passed

transition.title: All files are virus free
transition.description: Antivirus checking of all files passed

state.title: Waiting for Aleph
state.description: Wating till Aleph gets back SysNumber of an exported record

transition.title: All SysNumbers got from Aleph
transition.action: All sysNumbers are got from Aleph

state.title: Prepare for Acquisition
state.description: An Acquisition administrator is preparing an ePublication for acquisition.

state.title: Acquisition
state.description: An ePublication is reviewed by Acquisitor.

state.title: Accessing
state.description: An ePublication is provided to given libraries to access them.

guard.guard-role: E-Deposit: Assigned Acquisitor, E-Deposit: ISBN Agency Administrator, E-Deposit: Assigned Librarian, Site administrator

transition.title: Approve and to Catalogization
transition.description: ISBN is OK and Acquision is OK. So it can go to catalogization.
